app.locale.label: Language
app.errors.title: Something went wrong.
welcome.hero.title: Reserve a table in our restaurant without waiting.
welcome.hero.description_prefix: We'll handle the atmosphere, you just pick the time and guest count. Tables available:
welcome.full_notice: Sorry, all tables are fully booked right now.
welcome.availability.title: Current availability
welcome.menu.title: Seasonal menu with bold flavors
welcome.menu.description: House-made focaccia, grilled trout with herb butter, and a caramelized apricot dessert. Come enjoy the new evening tasting.
auth.placeholders.name: Full name
auth.login.title: Log in to your account
auth.login.description: Enter your email and password below to log in
auth.register.title: Create an account
auth.register.description: Enter your details below to create your account
auth.forgot.title: Forgot password
auth.forgot.description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
auth.reset.title: Reset password
auth.reset.description: Please enter your new password below
auth.verify.title: Verify email
auth.verify.description: Please verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you.
auth.verify.link_sent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
auth.confirm.title: Confirm your password
auth.confirm.description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
auth.two_factor.auth_description: Enter the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
auth.two_factor.recovery_description: Please confirm access to your account by entering one of your emergency recovery codes.
settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile and account settings
settings.appearance.title: Appearance settings
settings.password.title: Update password
settings.password.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure
settings.profile.title: Profile information
settings.profile.description: Update your name and email address
settings.profile.resend_verification: Click here to resend the verification email.
settings.profile.link_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
settings.profile.delete.title: Delete account
settings.profile.delete.description: Delete your account and all of its resources
settings.profile.delete.warning_descript: Please proceed with caution, this cannot be undone.
settings.profile.delete.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
settings.profile.delete.confirm_descript: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will also be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
settings.two_factor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
settings.two_factor.disabled_description: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted for a secure pin during login. This pin can be retrieved from a TOTP-supported application on your phone.
settings.two_factor.enabled_description: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random pin during login, which you can retrieve from the TOTP-supported application on your phone.
settings.two_factor.recovery.title: 2FA recovery codes
settings.two_factor.recovery.description: Recovery codes let you regain access if you lose your 2FA device. Store them in a secure password manager.
settings.two_factor.recovery.note_prefix: Each recovery code can be used once to access your account and will be removed after use. If you need more, click
settings.two_factor.modal.enabled_descri: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
settings.two_factor.modal.enable_descrip: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
settings.two_factor.modal.verify_descrip: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
settings.two_factor.errors.setup_key: Failed to fetch a setup key.
reservations.public.hero.title: Pick your date, time, and guests.
reservations.public.hero.description_pre: We'll hold your spot once you log in. Tables available now:
reservations.public.form.title: Tell us when you want to visit
reservations.public.form.description: Choose a date, time range, and guest count to check availability.
reservations.public.auth.title: Sign in to confirm
reservations.public.auth.description: Log in or create an account to finish your reservation.
reservations.public.confirm.title: Confirm your reservation
reservations.public.confirm.description: Review the details and finalize your booking.
reservations.ui.form.title: New reservation
reservations.ui.form.description: Pick a date and time range, then confirm the guest count.
reservations.ui.form.availability.full: No tables available for this slot.
reservations.ui.form.availability.error: Unable to check availability right now.
reservations.ui.form.summary_empty: Choose a date and time to see your reservation summary.
reservations.ui.list.title: My reservations
reservations.ui.list.confirm_cancel: Do you really want to cancel this reservation?
